sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto market remains under sustained bearish pressure as weak demand and low confidence dominate price action into year-end.
A hoped-for breakout year in 2025 failed to materialize as the October crypto crash dragged down the already struggling corner of the alts...
Bears have a firm grip on the leading GameFi tokens, with the majority of them in the red.
Bitcoin bulls are putting up a fight on Friday to break this week's choppy action that has capped all advances at around $90000.
BitFuFu Inc. is deeply undervalued versus peers, trading at a forward EV/Sales of 1.23x. Click here to read why FUFU stock is a Buy.

hypothesis_content.title: BTC Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a Bollinger Band squeeze (20-day BB width < 0.5 * 30-day average width) during NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-day average will lead to a sustained directional move of at least 5% in the breakout direction within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes indicate compression of volatility, which often precedes expansion. In NEUTRAL regimes, these breakouts tend to be more reliable as they're not fighting strong directional trends. Volume confirmation filters out false breakouts.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-day Bollinger Band width < 0.5 * 30-day average width
Price closes above upper Bollinger Band (20-day, 2 std)
Volume on breakout day > 1.5x 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Close back inside Bollinger Bands (below upper band)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction fails to sustain > 3% move within 3 days OR > 60% of breakouts immediately reverse back inside bands.
